definition: to give birth without complications/easy childbirth/safe delivery/natural birth (without surgical operation)
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: You have had 2 cesareans before, but you have also had a vaginal delivery.
sentences.chinese: 你有兩次剖腹產，但也有一次順產經歷。

sentences.english: Why? I would like to second child when the birth .
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼？我想生第二個孩子的時候順產。

sentences.english: And if a natural birth would pose a health risk for mother or baby, a c-section would be allowed.
sentences.chinese: 如果順產會威脅母嬰健康，允許進行剖腹產。

sentences.english: Women who have easy labors and don't need any stitches may feel pretty normal right away.
sentences.chinese: 順產的婦女和沒有進行手術的婦女可能感覺如常。

sentences.english: And if a natural birth would pose a health risk for mother or baby, ac-section would be allowed.
sentences.chinese: 如果順產會威脅母嬰健康，允許進行剖腹產。

definition: expected date of childbirth/estimated due date (EDD)
abbr. for 產前檢查|产前检查[chan3 qian2 jian3 cha2]
woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
to face childbirth/about to give birth/refers esp. to the onset of regular contractions
two simultaneous happy events in the family
(neologism c. 2017) adult who behaves in a childish manner (e.g. throwing a tantrum)
